lines.content: > ‚ÄúYour mind is for having ideas, not holding them.‚Äù ‚Äì David Allen ([source](https://dansilvestre.com/productivity-quotes/))
Duke frees your mind by remembering things you need to do
1. Pull the code from the repo [here](https://github.com/anchengyang/ip)
4. Let it manage your tasks for you üëç
